snippet.title: #DRIVE Rally | Full Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2494780?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=releasetrailer
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/drive-rally-d500ef
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/drive_rally

The golden era of rally racing returns for good on April 16th! #DRIVE Rally speeds into version 1.0, leaving Early Access behind. Get ready for screeching tires, roaring engines, and flying gravel, all fueled by adrenaline and ‘90s vibes. We would like to invite you to experience top-tier rally excitement, where speed, reflexes, and precision are key! #DRIVE Rally will be available on PC Steam, MacOS and Steam Deck.

In version 1.0, #DRIVE Rally will offer 22 cars in 3 different rally classes each, fully customizable, waiting for the best drivers and co-drivers ready to compete. Over 600 km of rally stages across 6 unique locations are set to witness intense challenges in which every second counts. The game offers various gameplay modes – classic championships, free roam with collectibles, or party mode, which allows for local competition for up to 12 players.

#DRIVE Rally 1.0 Main Features:
- Redefined Arcade Racing
- Local Party Mode up to 12 players
- Free Roam Mode with collectibles
- Global Leaderboards with saved Ghosts
- 6 Passionate Co-Drivers with their own Championships
- 22 Customizable Legendary Cars, each in 3 Classes
- Over 600km of Rally Stages in 6 locations
- Perfect shots with Photo Mode
- Controller and Wheel Support
- Steamdeck Verified

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/drivegame

Visit https://drive.game/ for more information or check out one of our social media profiles:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/drivethegame
Facebook - https://facebook.com/drive.game
Instagram - https://instagram.com/drive.game
